title: How to repay my debts to the past generations of scientists who worked tirelessly for my generation and the betterment of humanity - Quora

response.answer_text: Newton once said that he was able to see further because he is standing on the shoulders of earlier scientists. He is humbly acknowledging the contribution of earlier workers. We acknowledge the findings of present day and recent past scientists in our work in the citation section . This way one can acknowledge knowledge their help and your debtness. But we no longer cite Newton or Kepler because it is well known in the scientific community of their contribution.

We use telephone and electric bulbs everyday and paying our tributes silently to Graham Bell and Thomas Edison. There are so many scientists in human history who have invented life saving drugs and we use it every day. Our tribute is instantaneous.
